title: Check if a Byte is a Valid Hex Character
description:
ISC_HEX tests whether a sign IN is a hex character, If IN is a sign 0..9, A..F,
a..f the function returns TRUE if the function returns FALSE.
The signs are 0..9 are the codes (48..57)
The characters A..F are the codes (65..70)
The characters a..f are the codes (97..102)
name: ISC_HEX

input.name: IN
input.description: The input byte to be checked if it is a valid hexadecimal character.

return_value.description: Returns TRUE if the input byte is a valid hexadecimal character, FALSE otherwise.
